EmailTemplate.name: Call Request for Credit Card
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Call Request: Payment Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
You may have attempted to send us updated payment information and received a message failure response. This is the result of the payment information contained within your original email.
For security purposes, we are unable to accept credit card numbers sent via email. Any attempt to send a message containing this sensitive information will be blocked by our email servers. We do this to ensure your personal information remains protected.
Please let me know the best number to reach you on and Iâ€™ll give you a call to collect this information and enter it securely into our system. I apologize for any inconvenience and look forward to speaking with you. Thank you!
Thank you,
